Hi, I would like to use Heritrix to crawl websites of a country. Other than=
 the apparent ccTLD (.sg,.us,.uk, etc) criteria, I want to determine the "n=
ationality" of a website by its IP address.

Therefore I will need to do a =
IP address lookup and decide to accept a link if it lies within a range of =
networks.

I added the ExternalGeoLocationDecideRule in my DecideRuleSequen=
ce, but I have no idea about ExternalGeoLookupInterface. Looking at the sou=
rce, it looks like I have to implement the class. After I implement the cla=
ss (e.g. iplookup.class), what should I fill in for Implementation? Should =
it be iplookup or iplookup.class?

Also, where should I keep this class fil=
e? Should I copy this class file to the DecideRule folder? Is rebuilding ne=
cessary?

Thanks in advance.
